channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Summer Fridays are dead because remote work killed them
item.description: Companies are using relaxed schedules and decreased productivity as excuses to reel back the warm weather benefit.

item.title: What to Know About the Heat Wave in Europe
item.description: Some parts of Western Europe were starting to cool off as the extreme heat that has gripped the continent moved east.

item.title: Can AI cook a brisket? We pitted three smart grills against each other to find out
item.description: Barbeque can be a high-tech game.

item.description: Thomas J. Barrack Jr., the U.S. ambassador to Turkey, says Washington is facilitating the discussions and prioritizing economic development over natio...

item.title: Airbnb exec quit her job to take a gap year with her husband and 3 kids—she credits the reset for propelling her to CEO of TaskRabbit
item.description: If you’re debating a career break, take note: Ania Smith’s year off in Argentina reshaped her life—paving the way to her current CEO role at TaskRabbi...

item.title: Diogo Jota, Liverpool Soccer Star, Dies in Car Crash at 28
item.description: Mr. Jota and his brother André Filipe died in Spain, the authorities said. The crash came two weeks after the Portuguese player’s wedding.

item.title: Jeffries Passes 4-Hour Mark in House Speech Opposing Trump’s Policy Bill
item.description: Representative Hakeem Jeffries, the New York Democrat and minority leader, delayed a final House vote with an impassioned speech, saying he would take...

item.title: Exclusive: Telegram blockchain startup TOP raises $28.5 million as messaging platform expands crypto footprint
item.description: Ribbit Capital led the Series A fundraise, with participation from Pantera Capital.

item.title: 3 takeaways from a cardiologist and ‘SuperAgers’ researcher on how to live longer and healthier
item.description: Dr. Eric Topol says science can make “big inroads by preventing age-related diseases.”

item.title: Supreme Court Agrees to Hear Cases Involving Transgender Athletes
item.description: The court announced it would hear challenges to state laws barring transgender athletes from girls’ and women’s sports.

item.title: Sandy Gall, War Correspondent Without Swagger, Dies at 97

item.title: North Korea Opens Beach Resort, Hoping to Attract Foreign Tourists
item.description: The resort was on Kalma Beach, which South Korean media nicknamed ‘North Korea’s Waikiki.”
